use_cases: ["Read mapping to extract C. pecorum sequences from newly sequenced koala strains DBDeUG_2018 and MC/MarsBar_2018 using PV3056/3 as one of multiple reference genomes", "Inclusion of PV3056/3 in the 20-genome dataset for phylogenomic reconstruction and core-genome alignment", "Comparative genomics analysis between PV3056/3 and other C. pecorum strains to identify SNPs and regions of recombination"]
